Set.Text: Forms a [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connection with the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital over water (if they're not already [ICON_CONNECTED] connected by land). Sea trade routes originating from this city have a 50% increase in range and produce an additional 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when connecting to another civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built on the coast.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_PEANUT] Peanut, [ICON_RES_PINEAPPLE] Pineapple and [ICON_RES_SOYBEAN] Soybean worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
City must have Walls.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_POTATOE] Potatoe and [ICON_RES_OATS] Oats worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food

Provides 1 extra copy of each improved luxury resource near this City. Each source of [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil and each Oasis provides +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Trade routes other players make to a city with a Bazaar will generate an extra 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the city owner and the trade route owner gains an additional 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the trade route.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_TEA]Tea, [ICON_RES_COFFEE] Coffee, [ICON_RES_TOBACCO] Tobacco worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE Each source of [ICON_RES_MANGO] Mango worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.

+25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built next to a River or Lake.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_SUNFLOWER] Sunflower, [ICON_RES_APPLE] Apple and [ICON_RES_BLUEBERRY] Blueberry worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.

Each source of [ICON_RES_SAPPHIRE] Sapphire, [ICON_RES_RUBY] Ruby, [ICON_RES_EMERALD] Emerald, [ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources mined nearby.

Each source of [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_LAVENDER] Lavender and [ICON_RES_HOPS] Hops worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Land Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron [ICON_RES_TIN] Tin [ICON_RES_MANGANESE] Manganese worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a mined source of Iron nearby.

Each source of [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat, [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, [ICON_RES_BARLEY] Barley, [ICON_RES_CORN] Corn worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_FOOD] Food to be moved from this city along trade routes inside your civilization.

Land trade routes originating from this city have a 50% increase in range and produce an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when connecting to another civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_TEA]Tea, [ICON_RES_COFFEE]Coffee, [ICON_RES_TOBACCO] Tobacco worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE Each source of [ICON_RES_MANGO] Mango worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
Requires 1 [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_TITANIUM] worked by this City + 2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.

Row.Text: Each source of [ICON_RES_FLAX] Flax worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Each source of [ICON_RES_ALOEVERA] worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
